content: Stream created by Tim Hosgood.
This is the stream for the upcoming workshop on Polynomial Functors that starts later today! There will be topics for each individual talks, as well as a topic for general information.
Nathanael Arkor changed the access permissions for this stream from Public to Web-public.
Matteo Capucci (he/him) renamed stream workshop: Polynomial Functors @ Topos to event: Polynomial Functors @ Topos.
